(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (For 
          (Lhs 
            (Variable 
              (Identifier "x"))) 
          (Do 
            (Statement 
              (Next))) 
          (In 
            (Arg 
              (Primary 
                (Lhs 
                  (Variable 
                    (Identifier "y")))))))))))
